hypermax_results.name: cifar10_resnet
hypermax_results.author: Bradley Arsenault
hypermax_results.description: These are the results from doing a random search using on the cifar10 dataset. We used the fast-ai code available here: https://github.com/fastai/imagenet-fast/tree/master/cifar10 but modified it to introduce hyperparameters that could be optimized. It was chosen because it converges very quickly.
